jobDescription: Job DescriptionSkillStorm is seeking a Machine Learning Engineer for one of our clients in Pennington, New Jersey. Job Description:Solid understanding of design & analysis of algorithms and data structuresSolid development skills in Java/Scala/PythonKnowledge of software development in all the layersExperience to develop complex production systems which handle the large amount of dataKnowledge of operating system concepts – Multi threading / concurrencyExperience in Statistical programming languages like –Python, R, TorchKnowledge and expertise with machine learning techniquesProficient knowledge of Linux environmentGood communication and presentation skillsDesired Skills:Experience in designing scalable systemsDebugging & troubleshooting the real-time issuesExperience in Data Visualization using D3, Tableau, ShinyExperience in source control like Git/TFS/SVNExperience with Python web services
